speed.title: Lightning Fast
speed.description: No more loading spinners. Your reports display in under a second, even with millions of rows of data.

realtime.title: Real-time Data
realtime.description: Your reports update automatically. No more manual refreshing or waiting for synchronization.

design.title: Premium Design
design.description: Professional reports with modern glassmorphism design that impresses your clients from first glance.

whitelabel.title: Complete White Label
whitelabel.description: Your logo, your colors, your custom domain. Flipika vanishes behind your brand.

ai.title: AI Insights
ai.description: Our AI analyzes your campaigns and automatically generates actionable recommendations.

support.title: Expert Support
support.description: A dedicated team available via chat 7/7 to support you through your migration.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce & Shopping Ads
ecommerce.description: Track your Shopping Ads performance with detailed reports on products, categories, and ROAS by SKU. Perfect for online stores managing catalogs of thousands of references.

leadgen.title: B2B Lead Generation
leadgen.description: Optimize your lead generation campaigns with reports that track the complete journey: from click to qualified conversion. CRM integrations available.

agency.title: Marketing Agencies
agency.description: Manage multiple clients from a single interface. Automated reports, complete white label, and integrated billing for an optimized agency workflow.

local.title: Local Businesses
local.description: Track your local campaigns (Google Maps, calls, directions) with geolocated metrics. Perfect for franchises and multi-location networks.

saas.title: SaaS & Software
saas.description: Track your complete acquisition funnel: free trials, paid conversions, LTV. Integrations with Stripe, Paddle, and major SaaS tools.

step1.title: Connect Your Sources
step1.description: Like DashThis, connect your marketing accounts. But with Flipika, data is retrieved live, not in snapshots.

step2.title: Unleash Your Layout
step2.description: Forget the rigid grid. Place your metrics where you want, change sizes, layer elements. It's your slide.

step3.title: Enrich Content
step3.description: Add images, videos, context. Don't limit yourself to cold number widgets.

step4.title: Wow Effect
step4.description: Share an interactive link with your clients. The navigation experience is fluid, animated, and modern.

time.title: Widget Limit
time.description: DashThis often charges per dashboard with a widget limit. For a complex client, you have to split into 3 dashboards... and pay 3 times.

maintenance.title: Cost Per Dashboard
maintenance.description: The DashThis model disincentivizes creating specific reports. Flipika encourages you to create as many reports as needed without extra cost.

opportunity.title: Brand Image
opportunity.description: Sending a '2010s look' dashboard gives a dated image to your agency. A modern design justifies your premium fees.

testimonial1.quote: DashThis was solid but too rigid. We couldn't do exactly what we wanted. Flipika gave us the creative freedom our Design team wanted.

testimonial2.quote: DashThis's 'periods' system was confusing for our clients. Flipika handles dates in a much more intuitive and flexible way.
testimonial2.author: Tom H.

testimonial3.quote: We had to pay for every new test dashboard. With Flipika, we can prototype as much as we want, we are much more agile.
testimonial3.author: Nadia K.

tip1.title: Rethink Your KPIs
tip1.description: Don't just copy your DashThis widgets blindly. Flipika allows for different data visualization, take advantage to improve readability.

tip2.title: Use Multi-Page
tip2.description: DashThis encourages infinite scrolling. Flipika handles multi-page reports structured like a presentation better.

tip3.title: Add Context
tip3.description: This is Flipika's strength. Add text slides, explanation, standard strategy between your data slides.

tip4.title: Make Templates
tip4.description: Flipika's template system is more powerful. Create a 'Master Template' and roll it out.

tip5.title: Forget the 50 Limit
tip5.description: There is no arbitrary limit of widgets per page on Flipika. Put as many metrics as necessary.

tip6.title: Export Your Presets
tip6.description: Note your custom filters and segments in DashThis to recreate them quickly in Flipika.

tip7.title: Test Interactivity
tip7.description: Show your clients they can hover over charts to see details, which was limited on DashThis.

faq.q1: Can I have more than 50 widgets?
faq.a1: Yes, there is no hard technical limit. However, for readability, we advise spreading over multiple slides, which is unlimited.
faq.a2: No, they are 100% dynamic. You change the date, everything updates. You filter, everything adapts. It's not a frozen image.
faq.q3: Is it more expensive than DashThis?
faq.a3: Often cheaper at equal volume. DashThis becomes very expensive when you have many dashboards. Flipika has a flatter and more predictable price.
faq.a4: Yes, you can import external data via Google Sheets, which is often more flexible than DashThis's CSV manager.
faq.a5: We use a modern charting library (Recharts) which is smoother, more beautiful, and more interactive than standard charts.
faq.a6: Yes, but you also have a totally free date selector. No need to create a 'Monthly' dashboard and a 'Weekly' one. It's the same report.
faq.a7: Yes, our editor allows grouping, aligning, and distributing your elements with pixel-perfect precision.
faq.a8: It is vector and high definition. It doesn't cut tables in the middle as sometimes happens elsewhere.
